A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: (NO SPOILERS) Temper your expectations. His movie is NOT what the critics are saying it is. Yes\, it is beautiful and there are some incredible visuals\, but that’s about where it ends. The plot\, the pacing\, the forced humor attempts\, etc. This movie left me feeling incredibly disappointed. The Star Wars galaxy used to feel massive. Those days are long gone.
